main.name: Ayodele Ajayi
main.description: Ops | Tooling | CI/CD | Play with the Code
main.bio: A bright, talented and ambitious DevOps/SysOps / Security / Application specialist with a strong technical background who possesses self-discipline and the ability to work with the minimum of supervision. Having exposure to a wide range of technologies & able to play a key role in diagnosing hardware, software problems, analyse network logs for security and to ensure that quality solutions meet business objectives. Possessing a good team spirit, deadline orientated and having the ability to organize and present complex solutions clearly and accurately.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Ayo delivers tasks to the up most excellence! Thank you for looking after our IT issues when I worked with you. You know your trade and a good person too

Ayo, you are have been extremely proactive and with every technical query I have had, you have always managed to resolve it sometimes even better than external suppliers that we work with! You would definitely be a great asset for any company and it is a shame we are not working with you at Indivior!
